text: Ata'eba tumi dhairyadharana karo yemana dhairyadharana karechilena rasulaganera madhye yamra chilena drrha-pratijna, ara tadera jan'ya tarahuro karo na. Tadera ya oyada kara hayechila ta yedina tara dekhabe sedina tara yena dinamanera eka gharira besi abasthana kare ni. Yathesta paumchano hayeche! Sutaram simalanghanakari lokadala byatita ara kake'i ba bidhbansa kara habe
